text:
@techinsider Mild infection... Sure, that's why Wuhan is in complete crisis mode, a hospital was built in 10 days, residents are being locked & even welded into their homes, flights canceled, borders closed, cities disinfected with water cannons.

Sure, keep peddling the 'mild infection' BS.
